entry.title: Sacred Heart Cathedral (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that communist forces set up their headquarters at the Sacred Heart Cathedral (pictured) during the 1948 battle for Kaifeng in the Chinese Civil War?

entry.title: Max Stephan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Max Stephan was sentenced to death for aiding a Nazi pilot who had escaped from a prisoner of war camp?

entry.title: 1892 Biddle vs. Livingstone football game (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the 1892 Biddle vs. Livingstone football game was the first college football game ever played between historically black schools?

entry.title: Lewis Pragasam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Malaysian percussionist Lewis Pragasam was drumming to "Joy to the World" at a Christmas concert when he suffered a fatal heart attack?

entry.title: Avengers assemble scene (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Spider-Man was chosen as the last character to return in Avengers: Endgame's Avengers assemble scene because it was designed to be emotional for audiences?

entry.title: Anthony W. Case (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the injuries Anthony W. Case suffered in a school shooting led him to give up baseball and turn to astrophysics as a career?

entry.title: The Tortured Poets Department (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Taylor Swift announced her upcoming eleventh studio album, The Tortured Poets Department, while accepting a Grammy for her album Midnights?

entry.title: delulu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that "delulu is the solulu" is a catchphrase?
